name: Invisibless
description:
----------------------------------IMPORTANT--------------------------------------------

PLAYER 2 can also play with I,J,K,L instead of 8,4,5,6.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You cant see nothing...

Not even yourself...

You. Must. Shoot.

Updates

1.1

- Add the posibility for Player 2 to play with I,J,K,L instead of 8,4,5,6; so you can play in small keyboards.

1.2

-Now you start the game with Enter, much easier.

-Some cool "fade in" at transitions.

-Buttons "Restart" and "Menu" added when game is finished.

1.3

-You may say "obviously" but yes, now you start in the menu instead of directly in the game.

-New background, less bright so you can clearly see your tank.

1.4

-Increased tank´s velocity.

-Now if you stay too long without shooting you will appear on the map for a moment.

-Arrows won´t move tanks anymore.

-Tutorial interface is changed, again.
